## YouTube Story Automation System

This project creates automated YouTube videos from stories using AI-powered narration and visuals.

**Features:**
- Story text processing (Kibritçi Kız story)
- Text-to-Speech narration (free/low-cost options)
- AI image generation (DeepSeek API or alternatives)
- Video composition with FFmpeg
- YouTube upload automation

**Target:** Create engaging story narration videos with minimal cost
